com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller

类 TradeListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller.TradeListController

  • public class TradeListController
extends java.lang.Object

    The TradeListController uploads the trade lists to the web server.

    另请参阅:
    ArrayList

      构造器和说明

      Get the user's trade list and restore them.

        public void addTrade(java.lang.String borrower,

            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String status,
            java.lang.String id)
        Add trade to trade list
        参数:
        borrower - string variable of borrowers
        owner - string variable of owner
        borrowerItemNames - arraylist variable of borrower item name
        ownerItemName - string variable of owner item name
        type - string variable of type
        status - string variable of status
        id - string variable of is

        names
